vlive.english: But I was told to wear another and had to take it off...

vlive.korean: '어화동동 오빠 금손이다' 그딴 거 필요 없어!
vlive.english: "Eohwadongdongi, oppa is golden hand!" I don't need that!!

vlive.korean: [그딴 거 없음] - 없어요 그딴 거 - 야!
그딴 거 아니에요. - 그딴 거야? 미안해.
vlive.english: No, it wasn't that. - No? Sorry.

vlive.korean: 제가 좋아하는 거 하나 시킬게요. - [그딴 거 없고] 딸기 하나 주세요.
vlive.english: Let me order one I like. - [Ignoring his request] 1 strawberry, please.

examples.english: You wearing the same sort of thing?
Mr Hearne: Far be it from me to do such a thing.

examples.korean: 그딴 건 기억 안 나. 어떤 빌어먹을 것도 기억 못해.
examples.english: Craft cant remember not a damn thing.

examples.korean: 이동식 주택? 별도의 화장실? 그딴 건 잊어.
examples.english: A mobile home? A separate lavatory? Forget it.
Oh, don't say such a thing.
